page.title: 18Agricultural Research 2.
page.content: {Agricultural Research Council {Farming} 1985 land use:_ 300 hectares, grazing and animal feed. None sold. 23 hectares, winter barley. 8 hectares, spring barley. 8 hectares maize. 8 hectares, grassland. Areas of mangolds, cabbage, swedes. 4 deciduous plantations. Animals bred for research. 1500 sheep. Breeds:_ Clun Forest, Dales breed Finnish land race, Border Leicester, Jacob's, Merino, Welsh Mountain, Friesland, Soay, Barbary, Mouflon. 100 pigs.Breeds:_ Large white, Vietnamese, Pot-bellied. 100 goats. Breeds:_ British, Anglo-Nubian. 10 cows. Breed:_ Jersey. Employees:_ Farm manager and 13 farm-workers. Problems with harassment from anti-vivissectionists.
